definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: This season, however, has been the worst for Valencia in many years.
sentences.chinese: 但是這個賽季是巴倫西亞近年中最糟糕的。

sentences.english: "Obertan and Valencia are good players, " Park said.
sentences.chinese: “奧貝坦和巴倫西亞都是很好的球員，”朴智星說。

sentences.english: "Antonio is a bright footballing man and he picks things up very quickly, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “巴倫西亞踢球很聰明，他學東西很快，”他說。

sentences.english: Silva may be sold by Los Che to help balance the books at the club, who are in debt.
sentences.chinese: 深陷債務的巴倫西亞可能會賣掉席爾瓦來平衡收支。

sentences.english: Therefore many of the Valencia stars (who have little time for the current coach, Ronald Koeman) want out.
sentences.chinese: 因此，很多巴倫西亞球星想要離開球隊。
